title: Cubes
description: Here we have a Three.js experiment that creates a playful set of boxes interacting with one another. The boxes bounce and collide in response to mouse movements, mimicking a fun physics-based simulation, bringing a dynamic and interactive visual effect to life.

title: Notepad
description: This is an interface that simulates a notebook entirely made in CSS. HTML tags are used to emulate how we manually take notes. No images were used in this example.

title: Axo
description: 3D axonometric visualization inspired by the nostalgic memories of playing The Sims and SimCity, depicting a vibrant city corner. The scene was crafted using 3D modeling and rendering techniques, enhanced with detailed Photoshop and Illustrator work.

title: Background
description: Background illustration of an abandoned city, crafted in Photoshop. This piece captures the eerie desolation and haunting beauty of an empty urban landscape, blending detailed digital painting techniques to evoke a sense of mystery and decay.

title: The Last of Us
description: 3D visualization experiment inspired by The Last of Us show. Combining 3D modeling, rendering, Photoshop, and Illustrator to create a detailed, atmospheric scene, capturing the essence of the series in a visually immersive piece.

title: Cowboy
description: An engaging set of illustrations, featuring this cool cowboy. This collection showcases a variety of detailed and expressive drawings, each adding to the overall visual narrative

title: Kiki's Delivery Service
description: 3D visualization of Okino Residence from Studio Ghibli's Kiki's Delivery Service. A blend of 3D modeling, rendering, Photoshop, and Illustrator, bringing to life the charming architecture and warmth of this iconic setting in a visually captivating scene.

title: CSS Chronometer
description: CSS-only chronometer experiment utilizing pure CSS animations and transformations to simulate a ticking timer. No JavaScript is used, showcasing creative timing, transitions, and keyframe techniques for a visually dynamic effect.

title: Gator
description: A study of a gator in a rendered style, exploring a different approach in illustration.

title: Elf Bassist
description: A fun character design exercise featuring some unique elf band members. This illustration explores distinct personalities and styles, capturing the playful spirit of fantasy character creation.

title: Pixels
description: Here we have a JavaScript script that creates an image loading animation with a pixelated effect, emulating the concept of a device from the early 2000s.
